definition: to plan to/to draft (a plan)/to imitate/to assess/to compare/pseudo-
doubtful/suspicious/variant of 擬|拟[ni3]/to emulate/to imitate
to agree/to conclude/to draw up/to subscribe to (a newspaper etc)/to order

sentences.english: to formulate work plans for dispatching representatives of state stock ownership to the state holding and joint-stock corporations.
sentences.chinese: 拟订向国有控股和参股公司派出国有股权代表的方案。

sentences.english: Guarantee the staffs for their work and rights with fare-thee-well measurements.
sentences.chinese: 确保员工权及工作保障，并拟订完备之配套措施。

sentences.english: The soil criteria of P supplying ability worked out here were much lower than that commonly used for farmland.
sentences.chinese: 本文拟订的供磷能力分等标准比农田习用的要低得多。

sentences.english: to prepare, organize and implement a mid-long term and annual development plan regarding water affairs.
sentences.chinese: 拟订水务中长期发展规划和年度计划，并组织实施。

sentences.english: He chalked out his plan of establishing a new course.
sentences.chinese: 他拟订了增设新课程的计划。

sentences.english: stipulating holiday tourist policies and organizing the implementation.
sentences.chinese: 拟订假日旅游政策并组织实施。

sentences.english: To guide and organize the enactment or formulation of norms and standards for coal sector.
sentences.chinese: 指导和组织制定或拟订煤炭行业规范和标准工作。

sentences.english: Give details of the proposed order and the reasons for requesting the proforma invoice.
sentences.chinese: 详细暂拟订单细节和请求发出形式发票。

sentences.english: Whatever plans have been drawn up, whatever laws formulated, have come from the pen.
sentences.chinese: 任何计划的拟订，任何法律的制定，无一不出自于笔。

sentences.english: Enrolled in the study were 332 patients.
sentences.chinese: 试验拟订332例患者进入研究。

sentences.english: The Framers of the American Constitution did not include a bill of rights in that document.
sentences.chinese: 美国宪法的草创人没有在宪法中拟订一份权利法案。

sentences.english: Draw out the draft of articles for industrial board of trade.
sentences.chinese: 拟订工业同业公会章程草案。

definition: to make a draft/to draw up (plans)
first draft/to draw up (a first version)
to reach an agreement/to agree upon
to issue/to proclaim/to enact (laws, decrees etc)
rules/regulations/constitution/statute/articles of association (of company)/articles of incorporation/charter (of a corporation)/by-laws
Huitong county in Huaihua 懷化|怀化[Huai2 hua4], Hunan
